name: Run Wrix Run
description:
Run Wrix Run is a quick action quest set in the land of Ground, developed for the RPG Maker forum's One Map Challenge event:

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/one-map-game-challenge-submissi...

Typical playtime is 5 minutes.

You play as Wrix, a fleetfooted, truehearted Elf soldier:

Your mission is to secure a mystic crystal known as the Glammer from the depths a steamy lava dungeon.

Look out for the Spikers!!

If you'd like to see more of Wrix, check out Sandstone!

https://3b48.itch.io/sandstone
